general_advisory: Sow rice seeds in well-prepared fields. Use balanced fertilizers for wheat. Take care of cattle health and provide proper nutrition.

advisory: Sow seeds at a depth of 2 inches.
Provide irrigation at critical growth stages.
Protect the crop from pests and diseases.
Apply nitrogen fertilizer during stem elongation.
Monitor for water stress and provide irrigation as needed.
Harvest when moisture content is below 14%.
Ensure availability of clean water at all times.
Provide a balanced diet containing roughage and concentrates.
Vaccinate against common diseases as per schedule.
